summary: A doctor's daughter is kidnapped and buried alive, and he is given just five hours to find and rescue her.
cast: William Prince|Jim Backus|Christine White|Jacqueline Scott|Susan Morrow|Philip Tonge|Jonathan Kidd|Dorothy Morris|Howard Hoffman|Ellen Corby|Linda Guderman|Voltaire Perkins|Robert Colbert|Robb White
keywords: psychotronic film|graveside service|mausoleum|pregnancy|death by giving birth
title: Macabre
